custom_configuration_fields.label: General Video Play Error Message
custom_configuration_fields.tooltip_text: The text of the error message that is presented to the user when a general error occurs in the player.
custom_configuration_fields.default: The video encountered an error and cannot be played. Click the icon below to go back.

custom_configuration_fields.label: General Video Play Error Button Text
custom_configuration_fields.tooltip_text: The text on the button that appears alongside a general error message

custom_configuration_fields.label: Connectivity Error Message
custom_configuration_fields.tooltip_text: The text of the error message that is presented to the user when a connectivity error occurs in the player
custom_configuration_fields.default: We are experiencing connectivity issues. Please make sure you are connected to the internet and try again.

custom_configuration_fields.label: Connectivity Error Button Text
custom_configuration_fields.tooltip_text: The text on the button that appears alongside a connectivity error message
